statements: UPDATE member_feedback SET performance_review = 'Good job on the last assignment!', date_submitted = '2023-08-15' WHERE feedback_id = 1;

UPDATE member_feedback SET class_review = 'The class was very informative and engaging.', instructor_review = 'The instructor needs to improve communication.', date_submitted = '2023-08-20' WHERE member_id = 5;
